welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Taastrup, Denmark! Get ready to experience the beautiful landscapes, rich history, and friendly locals that make our city a must-visit destination. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Taastrup has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Roskilde Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Roskilde Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kastrup Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Kastrup Airport, serving mainly low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
